landing.subtitle: Your Welding Solutions for all industries

about.title: Who are we?
about.body: A multi service welding company providing innovative, custom solutions for a wide array of industrial, commercial, and agricultural clients.

services.title: Services
services.body: Thompson Boiler Works Inc. together with our affiliated companies Ritchie’s Welding and McNolty Mechanical is able to offer our customers a wide range of versatile welding procedures & metal fabricating.  A full-service welding  operation , when you work with us you will receive precision results from certified welders who follow all trade regulations and practices keeping safety our top priority.
services.imageCaption: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

projects.title: Projects
projects.body: Large or Small projects when complex welding or outside-the box-thinking is needed in repairing or producing challenging tasks. Thompson Boiler Works is a one stop shop for your needs.  The team is engaged and strive daily in doing the work right, the first time.  We  have proven time and again that we  work well in crunch time to satisfy the need of our customers.

one.body: Founded in 1988, privately owned and operated. Thompson Boiler Works has come a long way from its beginnings, originally specializing in commercial industrial boiler making and repairs. Today over 33 years later Thompson Boiler Works has encompassed other aspects of the commercial - industrial mechanical field, while still maintaining the core business of boilers and pressure vessels.

two.body: Thompson Boiler Works Inc. was built on quality and continues to deliver on quality. Our core is our people and our customers. We provide premier service with benchmark levels of safety, turnaround time, and cooperation. We specialize in finding clear solutions to complex problems by partnering with our clients. Through teamwork we complete your projects safely, on time, and on budget.

services.title: Services
services.flavorText: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

one.title: Two 300 Ton Chiller Installation
one.body: Two 7500 Ton chiller installation at the Federal CHCP (Central Heating and Cooling Plant). All associated Supply and return piping was 20-24”. Extensive heavy lift / rigging / offsite fabrication and commissioning.

two.title: Emergency Temporary Boiler Plant
two.body: Emergency Temporary boiler plant main steam header fabrication and installation. All piping built and inspected to ASME B31.1 by TSSA (Technical Safety Standards Authority) with 100% X-Ray NDT inspections. Uninterrupted delivery to meet heating season and process demands.

three.title: Hospital Steam Boiler Package
three.body: Hospital Steam boiler package installation. High pressure steam used for heating and process sanitation.
three.imageCaption: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam porttitor urna quissapien rutrum volutpat.

four.title: Industrial Maintenance
four.body: Thompson has consistently shown leadership in an industrial market place by providing technical experience, knowledge and power production to its clients.

five.title: Fabrication
five.body: Thompson has complete piping spool / structural and custom fabrication capabilities for Carbon Steel, Stainless Steel, Alloy's and Aluminum. All welding performed at our fabrication facilities is performed to meet or exceed TSSA, ASME & CWB.

six.title: High Pressure Welding Capabilities
six.body: Thompson has Field Installation / Fabrication capabilities for Carbon Steel, Stainless Steel, Alloy's and Aluminum. All welding performed is done to ASME & CWB qualified welding procedures.

careers.title: Careers
careers.flavorText: At Thompson Boiler Works we are constantly looking for new and passionate employees. If you are interested in a possible position please fill out and attach your resume below!

form.name: Name
form.dropzoneLabel: Upload your resume in the pdf format, and ensure it's less than 2 mb.
